name: Sword & Shield (StruckDumb)
description:
The game features two main mechanics, the "sword" and shield! Control the sword to eliminate enemies, while using the shield to defend against projectiles.  As you survive more waves, the enemies will grow stronger and appear more frequently. As you defeat enemies, upgrade your sword and shield or recover health in the "Escape" menu using points gained. How long can you last? 

Created for the United Game Jam 2020.  Theme: Two

Full screen is recommended.

Beginner? Technically no, but it's only my second game.

Font - 6809 Chargen

Music - ChipTunes Lite

Sound Effects - Sfxr
